attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please stop this obscene culture of bonuses, either in money or shares, to the overpaid - over exalted - over important, people who deal in finance. A country's wealth should be judged on its humanity to its citizens. I am a pensioner and I share what little money I have and am sickened by what has happened and been exposed over the last few months. All at the top are to blame - shame on you.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
